articles.content: Is James Bond a gay icon? Despite his (often) problematic, womanizing ways, why do so many queer people cite the Double-O agent as a childhood idol? Those are the million-dollar questions that inspir… [+2441 chars]

articles.title: Love, Victor: Michael Cimino Explains How the Love, Simon Spinoff Is Breaking Boundaries - Entertainment Tonight
articles.description: Newcomer Michael Cimino tells ET he’s honored to be portraying a gay Latino love story in 'Love, Victor,' premiering June 17 on Hulu.
